"Very well," Gatara says, apparently resigned to losing such a potent 
weapon.  "Riekan ..."

The Rogue in question releases his grip on Phoenix, who hesitantly 
walks over to Flicker's side.

"Now, the two of you better get out of here before I change my mind," 
Gatara warns, fingering her machine gun.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Flicker:  O.k. now let her go.
> 
> He gets close to the gatling gun control, and fingers
> the detonator.  Even though the supplies are out he
> could still send the transport hurtling into the
> shield and set it off.  It would probably do some
> damage.
